I've got a Voucher for Director's Cut, Tarot Merchant, Grabber, and Hieroglyph, but I need to focus on this shop. I've also got two consumables open.

Buying and immediately using it levels up Two Pair (which also affects Spare Trousers) and boosts Constellation from x3.5 to x3.6. That's a no-brainer. After this purchase, I'll have $31 left.

My final decision: **Buy and use Uranus**. It's the right choice.
